room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: We've done the Gold Rush and The Heist rooms and both were excellent. Challenging, so you really feel accomplished if you are able to escape. This is a really fun activity. We'll be back at Christmas to try the Prison Break room!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My family and I did the Gold Rush escape this past weekend. We all loved it! The puzzles were challenging, but we all worked together and figured things out. Our group consisted of my 10-year-old daughter, my husband, my 71-year-old mother in law and me. My daughter was able to figure some things out, my mother in law really enjoyed helping, and once my husband figured out what it was all about, he really got into it as well! The hour flew by, we were so focused on the task and having such a great time! I highly recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My father and I came and did it and we absolutely loved it. We were paired with great people. The Gold Mind room was elaborate with challenging, yet solvable puzzles. Thanks for a great time, we will return!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: You have to do this if you go to pigeon forge! We liked it so much we did two different events in one day! The staff is very welcoming. A must have on your to do list!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: We escaped! We had a great time here and would definitely do it again. I wouldn't bring kids but it's a great idea for adults looking for something new. The staff was friendly and helpful and the room (Gold Rush) was so well thought out. Great experience!
